title: Kayn is the ultimate Edgelord
body:
It's like they went down a checklist:

Dark and mysterious: ✓
SHADOWS: ✓
DEMONS: ✓
Anime/Ionian: ✓
SCYTHE WIELDER: ✓
Wild, colored hair: ✓
Fighting inner demon trope: ✓
Duality: ✓
Corruption/body transformation trope: ✓
Edgy ass name; ✓

~~And I love it~~

It's spelled Skaarl!

Wait a moment.... Sk**aa**rl..... **Aa**trox..... Rh**aa**st....
OMG, SKAARL IS A DARKIN!!!!

WHAT IT ALL MAKES SENSE NOW. Aatrox, Rhaast, Vaarus, Jaax and Skaarl, the five darkins!

I'm waiting for the moment they change Varus to Vaarus.

Skaarl

FTFY
FTFY? Don't yah mean TGIF, Thank God its Friday?
But it's Wednesday. .__.
I know, that is the plot twist
He either transforms into edge or edge, there is no other option.

So what kind of edge to you want?
You want the silver-haired assassin kind of edge?
Or straight up demon that gets better based on the suffering of others kind of edge?
Gonna go for the darkin every game. I main aatrox after all.
Too bad aatrox doesn't play like a darkin :p
http://i.imgur.com/IP73r.gif
Well. we finally get to see one of Zed's top dogs.
-1 for lack of silver hair to become the ultimate edge lord

Too bad, he have that too.
https://lolstatic-a.akamaihd.net/frontpage/apps/prod/rg-kayn-reveal/en_US/5115a0cec3b91d12ad46d6ffdb35b0a53ef9e1c2/assets/img/kayn-collage.jpg

They got you covered, don't worry

https://1.bp.blogspot.com/-Z5CJ_d4oFK0/WVM_1ZWDfSI/AAAAAAAAoFc/-0jArWz7_RI54C4CWvx0Kob9lzVg_8r8ACEwYBhgL/s1600/kayn.png
So, question, do people like this stuff?  I'm not really all up to date on internet lingo and whatnot, but I've only ever heard "edgelord" used derogatorily.

"Edgelord" is a derogatory term for this sort of character. It's used to refer to the 'emo, dark, all-about-me-and-my-sorrow' characters. Illidan Stormrage from WoW is a prominent example of a typical 'edgelord.'

It's getting to the point where the term is becoming more endearing/embraced by fans who like edgelords, and a word of parody than actual negativity, though.
What torment?  Dude seems like an unapologetic killer that doesn't suffer in the least.  He's not edgy, he's just a psycho with a scythe and a crippling fear of shirts.

And this represents a large portion of why Kayn and Raast are getting a largely positive reception so far, at least thematically. Visually, he's so stereotypically edgy that you can't help but like the parody (Kayn's visuals turn the edge meter up to 11), while his personality isn't entirely cringeworthy (See - Yasuo or Illidan).
Kids like this stuff.
Stupid question here: What is so significant about an edgelord?

It's an insulting term for the kind of "badass" character you might find in a 13 year old boy's fanfic.  Some scowling badass that can kick everyone's ass and usually has some sort of generic or poorly-defined "inner torment" to angst over sorta.  Kinda like how a more macho Mary-Sue.

Most badasses come pretty close to edgelord status in the hands of bad writers and the 90's was all edgelords all the freakin' time.
Thank you for taking the time to tell that.

Someone once wrote that the film 300 had dialogue written by an 8 year olds...ya know. 

Anyway, I feel like that same author created this character. And all I can think is - I hope they made a character that really speaks to the "30-something, over worked, under paid, and stupidly attending grad school part time" player. 

You know, like a zombie that just looks perennially tired:

Passive - Skillless. Due to an alarming lack of skills, your passive gold generation takes an extra second. Should have gone to Business School. 

Q - Caffine Bomb: Gives you a +15% Armor bonus, and a +10% MS bonus for 4 seconds. For when you were on site at 7 a.m., and class begins at 7:00 p.m.

W - FOMO: You're poor and never have cash. Channeling this FOMO, you planes shift and are untargetable for 2 seconds. 

E - Crushed Dreams: unleashing a scathing blog post on nearby enemies about how you're never going to climb the corporate ladder, all nearby enemy units and champions suffer a 75% decrease in MS. Because you should have gone to Business School. 

R - Maybe I'll just quit and become a bartender: Give up on life, become a gypsy, and get a sleeve tattoo. You hurl a cocktail at a predefined location. Enemy units hit my your cocktail are charmed for 2 seconds, and give you an additional 15 gold.
idk why this is downvoted, it's kinda sad/funny

Thanks, man. Feel free to see my more fleshed out concept (after I wrote this one): https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/faJO5FxE-greg-the-underpaid-graduate-student?comment=0000
Also, his name is pronounced like Cain, the first murderer in the Bible.
Or Kane, leader of the Brotherhood of Nod.
Or cane, A stick for walking.
Nipple: ✓

Shieda Kayn's cool.

I wonder how straight they'll play it.  Overwatch has found massive fan success in Reaper, for example, but pretty much only because nobody takes him seriously.

I fail to see how anyone could take this guy seriously either.  But then... they're playing him seriously, so clearly Riot didn't get that memo that Reaper is only funny because they're self-aware of how much of an obnoxious edgelord he is.
Ah, Reapers character is so fkin funny
Reaper shrug is best emote.

Varus (bare chest, long hair, evil weapon, bishonen)

Talon (jumps over walls, assassin)
Aatrox (darkin)

Am I forgetting anyone?
